description: Suite of three __vsyslog_internal() heap overflows: crafted ident overflow, off-by-one reallocation, and integer overflow in size calculation

expected_stock.description: Heap corruption from ident string overflow, off-by-one newline write, or integer-overflow-induced undersized allocation; demonstrated as local root escalation via su/sudo

expected_tsm.description: Trailing canary detects all three overflow variants at free(); ClampSize prevents oversized writes; TruncateWithNull safely truncates long ident strings
